mapper.select: SELECT article_id, article_content, user_name, user_pwd, user_mail, create_date, edit_date FROM qusetbook ORDER BY article_id desc
SELECT article_id, article_content, user_name, user_pwd, user_mail, create_date, edit_date FROM qusetbook WHERE article_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qusetbook ( article_content, user_name, user_pwd, user_mail, create_date ) VALUES ( #{content}, #{name}, #{pwd}, #{mail}, SYSDATETIME )
mapper.update: UPDATE qusetbook SET article_content = #{content}, user_name = #{name}, user_pwd = #{pwd}, user_mail = #{mail}, edit_date = SYSDATETIME WHERE article_id = #{id}
